sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PDF_C401Y (DPOB_CD, YRTX_BLGG_YR, CLUT_SEPT_CD, SYSTEMKEY, SCH_UNI_SEIL_NUM, FORM_CD, RESID, NAME, DAT_CD, BUSNID, SCH_INTT_NM, SCH_INTT_UNI_SUM, PDF_DAT_APP_YN, PDF_DAT_APP_CMPL_DT, PDF_DAT_APP_EXC_CTNT, KYBDR, INPT_DT, INPT_ADDR, ISMT, REVN_DT, REVN_ADDR) VALUES(#dpobCd#, #yrtxBlggYr#, #clutSeptCd#, #systemkey#, (SELECT COUNT(*)+1 FROM PDF_C401Y), #formCd#, #resid#, #name#, #datCd#, #busnid#, #schInttNm#, #schInttUniSum#, #pdfDatAppYn#, #pdfDatAppCmplDt#, #pdfDatAppExcCtnt#, #kybdr#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'), #inptAddr#, #ismt#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'), #revnAddr#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PDF_C401Y SET DPOB_CD = #dpobCd#, YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr#, CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd#, SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#, SCH_UNI_SEIL_NUM = #schUniSeilNum#, FORM_CD = #formCd#, RESID = #resid#, NAME = #name#, DAT_CD = #datCd#, BUSNID = #busnid#, SCH_INTT_NM = #schInttNm#, SCH_INTT_UNI_SUM = #schInttUniSum#, PDF_DAT_APP_YN = #pdfDatAppYn#, PDF_DAT_APP_CMPL_DT = #pdfDatAppCmplDt#, PDF_DAT_APP_EXC_CTNT = #pdfDatAppExcCtnt#, ISMT = #ismt#, REVN_DT = #revnDt#, REVN_ADDR = #revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND SCH_UNI_SEIL_NUM=#schUniSeilNum#

UPDATE PDF_C401Y SET PDF_DAT_APP_YN=#pdfDatAppYn# , PDF_DAT_APP_CMPL_DT = SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'),0,8) , PDF_DAT_APP_EXC_CTNT = #pdfDatAppExcCtnt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND SCH_UNI_SEIL_NUM=#schUniSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PDF_C401Y WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD, YRTX_BLGG_YR, CLUT_SEPT_CD, SYSTEMKEY, SCH_UNI_SEIL_NUM, FORM_CD, RESID, NAME, DAT_CD, BUSNID, SCH_INTT_NM, SCH_INTT_UNI_SUM, PDF_DAT_APP_YN, PDF_DAT_APP_CMPL_DT, PDF_DAT_APP_EXC_CTNT, KYBDR, INPT_DT, INPT_ADDR, ISMT, REVN_DT, REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_C401Y WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND SCH_UNI_SEIL_NUM=#schUniSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD, YRTX_BLGG_YR, CLUT_SEPT_CD, SYSTEMKEY, SCH_UNI_SEIL_NUM, FORM_CD, RESID, NAME, DAT_CD, BUSNID, SCH_INTT_NM, SCH_INTT_UNI_SUM, PDF_DAT_APP_YN, PDF_DAT_APP_CMPL_DT, PDF_DAT_APP_EXC_CTNT, KYBDR, INPT_DT, INPT_ADDR, ISMT, REVN_DT, REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_C401Y WHERE 1=1 AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , SCH_UNI_SEIL_NUM ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PDF_C401Y WHERE 1=1 AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
